about_the_game:
Myths, mysteries, and… murder? Elijah Reed, a seasoned agent for the Ministry of Mysteries, finds himself embroiled in the most puzzling investigation of his career. This time, he heads to the heart of Greece - Athens - where ancient legends have become a sinister reality. His new partner in this quest is none other than the ancient Greek god Pan. Together they must understand what is driving the harpies mad, stop a new murderous cult, and prevent Medusa from turning everyone to stone. But the deeper they delve into the world of ancient myths, the more questions arise about where legend ends and truth begins.

This Collector's Edition includes:

🗝️ Unravel Ancient Mysteries!

Dive into the heart of Athens in one of the most engaging hidden object games. Explore enchanting locations filled with secrets and seek and find hidden objects that hold the key to solving the mystery of harpy madness and uncovering the cult's dark plans!

🗝️ Team Up with a God!

In this adventure game, team up with Pan, the Greek god of the wild, to outwit mythological creatures like harpies and Medusa. Use his unique abilities to uncover hidden truths and navigate a world where myths and reality collide!

🗝️ Shape Your Story!

Every decision matters in this immersive story. Your choices determine the fate of Athens, its citizens, and even its legendary figures. Will you restore peace or let chaos reign?

🗝️ Challenging Puzzles and Achievements!

Enjoy a mix of hidden object games and brain-teasing puzzles as you uncover clues, piece together ancient secrets, and unlock hidden achievements. The more you explore, the more surprises and rewards you’ll discover!
